meanings.sent1: After failing the test, she had to requalify by studying harder.
meanings.sent2: He is requalifying for the job by updating his skills.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried requalifying for the title of 'best napper' by taking extra-long naps.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to requalify as a swimmer was as strong as the ocean currents.
meanings.sent5: The sun requalifying its position in the sky marked the start of a new day.

meanings.definition: To meet the necessary requirements again
meanings.sent1: The athlete is requalifying for the competition by practicing daily.
meanings.sent2: She is requalifying for the scholarship by submitting her updated documents.
meanings.sent3: The clown requalifying for the circus job juggled even more balls this time.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to requalifying as a chef was like adding the perfect seasoning to a dish.
meanings.sent5: The tree requalifying its roots in the fertile soil grew taller and stronger.
